channel.title: Cellular Automata on Wsl Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cellular Automata on Wsl Blog

item.title: Randomly Generated Caves with Cellular Automata
item.description: So, every time I get the urge to write a blog post about whatever random bit of code I’m writing - I look at the blog and think: “Hm, this is kinda ugly.” Then, I have to rewrite it until I’m mostly satisfied with how it looks. Recently, I’ve been working on writing a nice little interface for handling menus and other parts of the UI for my roguelike project. Unfortunately, like the layout of this blog, I can’t seem to find a satisfactory ‘look and feel’ - I think I’ve got a good start though.
